```{r}

```

```{r}
mnl_wtp <- logitr(
    data     = yogurt,
    outcome  = "choice",
    obsID    = "obsID",
    pars     = c("feat", "brand"),
    scalePar = "price",
    numMultiStarts = 10
)
```
```{r}
summary(mnl_wtp)
```
